FOUND IN: Fractional Yen Coin: A clear description suggesting a coin that represents a fraction (one hundredth) of the standard yen unit, even if such a coin doesn't exist in reality.
Mobile: able to move or be moved freely and easily.
Looting (often used during crises or disasters)

Renowned maestro: An exceptionally talented musician who directs ensembles with great skill and authority.
